list.name: Default
list.comment: Fixed bug in PlayerInfoPanel where Longest Road and/or Largest Army would not display properly. Fixed bug in the Player class where getLongestRoadLength would always return 1. Fixed bug in GameController where development cards were not removed from the player's CardsFrame after they were played.

task.summary: Default task
Finished TradeInFrame and optimized DiscardFrame
Refactored project structure and added test classes
Re-added test classes
Scaled building costs cards and updated GameIcons and PlayerPanel accordingly. Also added a MouseListener to the building costs card icon in PlayerPanel that will show a larger version when clicked
Created the CardPane class to replace code that was copied and pasted into CardsFrame, DiscardFrame, and TradeInPane.

Finished the PlayDevCardFrame class and created a test for it. Refactored the CardPane class to just use JLabels and removed the ResourceLabel class. A player's harbors are now stored in a HashSet instead of an ArrayList.
Added harbor icons
Added CreatePlayersFrame class and its test class
Added icons for dice and added methods to GameIcons to retrieve them
Removed String references to resource types in method arguments and removed methods that had a String reference to a resource type as a parameter.
Added the StealResourceCardFrame class and a test for it

Added methods to GameController for constructing a new set of players and constructing a board. Added class ConstructPlayersTest for testing the method in GameController for constructing a new set of players.
Revised the BoardPane class to add Components to the pane more efficiently and increase readability
Finished setup phase in GameController
Reverted resource types to strings. Added methods to GameController to handle the event of a 7 being rolled. These methods still need to be tested.
Commit before using graphs

Decided to only use graphs in Player class for calculating longest road length. The methods that calculate the longest road length need larger scale testing (i.e. more than two roads). LocationConverter now returns copies of its private members instead of the private members themselves. DiscardFrame will no longer automatically resize itself. Moved stars showing valid robber locations under the number tokens and enlarged these stars in order to keep them visible. CardPane now sets the size of it labels using the label's preferred size instead of the label's icon (since it may not have one).
Consolidated construction methods in Board class. Set the constructGameBoard() method to exit the program when the user closes the frame (instead of just constructing a new board).
Added methods for building a new development card. Also fixed various bugs.
Added methods for building a new settlement.
Added methods for building a new city. Also reduced the size of the scaled building costs card icons and the settlement icons, and increased the size of the the city icons.

Added methods to handle playing a development card. Also added the new class YearOfPlentyFrame for when the Year of Plenty development card is played. Also added new class YearOfPlentyFrameTest for testing.
Added new class TradeFrame and added support for offering and accepting trades. Also added new class TradeFrameTest for testing the TradeFrame class.
Added miscellaneous "To Do" items
Moved constructPlayers() method from GameController to ConstructPlayersPanel and renamed ConstructPlayersPanel to PlayerConstructor
Added missing Javadoc comments to PlayerConstructor
Converted DiscardFrame into a dialog window and renamed to ResourceDiscard. Restructured the PlayerConstructor to make it easier to read.
Converted StealResourceCardFrame to a dialog window and renamed StealResourceCardFrame to StealResourceCard.
Replaced usages of Math.random() with Fisher-Yates shuffle or Collections.shuffle() (depending on the situation)
Converted the PlayDevCardFrame class (which used a JFrame to ask the user to select a development card to play) into the ChooseDevCard class (which uses a JDialog instead).

Renamed the TradeInFrame class to TradeInResourceCards and refactored to use JDialog to let the user trade in resource cards instead of a JFrame. Also replaced the image of the board background with an image of the frame of the board (the sea tiles).

Renamed the YearOfPlentyFrame class to PlayYearOfPlenty and refactored it to use a JDialog to let the user trade in resource cards instead of a JFrame. Also removed the YearOfPlentyListener and the window listener from the GameController class.
Renamed the TradeFrame class to OfferTrade and refactored it to use a JDialog to let the user create a trade offer instead of a JFrame.
Fixed tile placement bug in Board class. Closed an html tag in the StealResourceCard class. Added code to the determineTurnOrder() method in the GameController class to display the determined order.

Added methods to OfferTrade class for offering a trade to another player and updated OfferTradeTester to test these new methods. Also fixed several bugs in the OfferTrade class. Set the default close operation of the dialog windows in the PlayYearOfPlenty class and the TradeInResourceCards class to DISPOSE_ON_CLOSE. Removed unused method in the PlayYearOfPlenty class. Added LocationListener interface to the BoardPane class to replace ActionListener.

Added method getColoredName() to Player class. Replaced all usages of getName() where it is used to display a player's name with getColoredName(). Set the background color of PlayerPanel to Color.LIGHT_GRAY so the name of a Player whose color is white will be readable. Replaced offererName argument with an argument of type Player. Added documentation to PlayerPanelTest.

Moved icon size variables from LocationConverter to GameIcons. Refactored as many static variables as possible in LocationConverter to local variables. Added documentation to LocationConverter. Shrank the width and height of each tile icon by 1 pixel so they fit better in the board frame.
Replaced getScaledCostsCardIcon() and getUnscaledCostsCardIcon() in GameIcons with getCostsCardIcon() and manual image scaling when using the new method

Updated class description in the CardsFrame class. Added code to the CardPane constructor with the list of JLabels as an argument to sort the list by name. Added a "View Cards" button to the dialog that displays a trade offer so that the recipient can review their cards before making a decision.
Added button to view development cards in the DiscardResources class. Renamed "ResourceDiscardTest" to "DiscardResourcesTest"
Changed CardsFrame.getDevCardOrderIndex() to a public method
Changed the color of the "Cancel" icon that can be displayed when showing valid locations so it stands out more. Moved the position at which the "Cancel" icon is displayed to the bottom of the board.
Changed the color of the "Cancel" icon that can be displayed when showing valid locations so it stands out more. Moved the position at which the "Cancel" icon is displayed to the bottom of the board.
Ran Intellij's code reformatter on every class. Added a window icon to every window possible.
Ran Intellij's code reformatter on every class. Added a window icon to every window possible.

Renamed the createOffer() method in the OfferTrade class to createTrade() and moved it into its own class (called CreateTrade). Removed the Trade class from the OfferTrade class and made it a separate class in the soc.base.model package. Added checks to the CardPane class to ensure that every label has a name.

Replaced the RuntimeExceptions thrown in the Board class with IllegalArgumentExceptions. Added code to the setHarbor() method in the Corner class to throw an IllegalArgumentException if the specified harbor is invalid. Added to the class description of the DevelopmentCard class.
Added package documentation
Added package documentation

MESSAGE.value: Added new class TradeFrame and added support for offering and accepting trades. Also added new class TradeFrameTest for testing the TradeFrame class.
Added miscellaneous "To Do" items
Moved constructPlayers() method from GameController to ConstructPlayersPanel and renamed ConstructPlayersPanel to PlayerConstructor
Added missing Javadoc comments to PlayerConstructor
Converted DiscardFrame into a dialog window and renamed to ResourceDiscard. Restructured the PlayerConstructor to make it easier to read.
Converted StealResourceCardFrame to a dialog window and renamed StealResourceCardFrame to StealResourceCard.
Replaced usages of Math.random() with Fisher-Yates shuffle or Collections.shuffle() (depending on the situation)
Converted the PlayDevCardFrame class (which used a JFrame to ask the user to select a development card to play) into the ChooseDevCard class (which uses a JDialog instead).

Renamed the TradeInFrame class to TradeInResourceCards and refactored to use JDialog to let the user trade in resource cards instead of a JFrame. Also replaced the image of the board background with an image of the frame of the board (the sea tiles).

Renamed the YearOfPlentyFrame class to PlayYearOfPlenty and refactored it to use a JDialog to let the user trade in resource cards instead of a JFrame. Also removed the YearOfPlentyListener and the window listener from the GameController class.
Renamed the TradeFrame class to OfferTrade and refactored it to use a JDialog to let the user create a trade offer instead of a JFrame.
Fixed tile placement bug in Board class. Closed an html tag in the StealResourceCard class. Added code to the determineTurnOrder() method in the GameController class to display the determined order.

Added methods to OfferTrade class for offering a trade to another player and updated OfferTradeTester to test these new methods. Also fixed several bugs in the OfferTrade class. Set the default close operation of the dialog windows in the PlayYearOfPlenty class and the TradeInResourceCards class to DISPOSE_ON_CLOSE. Removed unused method in the PlayYearOfPlenty class. Added LocationListener interface to the BoardPane class to replace ActionListener.

Added method getColoredName() to Player class. Replaced all usages of getName() where it is used to display a player's name with getColoredName(). Set the background color of PlayerPanel to Color.LIGHT_GRAY so the name of a Player whose color is white will be readable. Replaced offererName argument with an argument of type Player. Added documentation to PlayerPanelTest.

Moved icon size variables from LocationConverter to GameIcons. Refactored as many static variables as possible in LocationConverter to local variables. Added documentation to LocationConverter. Shrank the width and height of each tile icon by 1 pixel so they fit better in the board frame.
Replaced getScaledCostsCardIcon() and getUnscaledCostsCardIcon() in GameIcons with getCostsCardIcon() and manual image scaling when using the new method

Updated class description in the CardsFrame class. Added code to the CardPane constructor with the list of JLabels as an argument to sort the list by name. Added a "View Cards" button to the dialog that displays a trade offer so that the recipient can review their cards before making a decision.
Added button to view development cards in the DiscardResources class. Renamed "ResourceDiscardTest" to "DiscardResourcesTest"
Changed CardsFrame.getDevCardOrderIndex() to a public method
Changed the color of the "Cancel" icon that can be displayed when showing valid locations so it stands out more. Moved the position at which the "Cancel" icon is displayed to the bottom of the board.
Ran Intellij's code reformatter on every class. Added a window icon to every window possible.

Renamed the createOffer() method in the OfferTrade class to createTrade() and moved it into its own class (called CreateTrade). Removed the Trade class from the OfferTrade class and made it a separate class in the soc.base.model package. Added checks to the CardPane class to ensure that every label has a name.

Replaced the RuntimeExceptions thrown in the Board class with IllegalArgumentExceptions. Added code to the setHarbor() method in the Corner class to throw an IllegalArgumentException if the specified harbor is invalid. Added to the class description of the DevelopmentCard class.
Added package documentation

Fixed bug in PlayerInfoPanel where Longest Road and/or Largest Army would not display properly. Fixed bug in the Player class where getLongestRoadLength would always return 1. Fixed bug in GameController where development cards were not removed from the player's CardsFrame after they were played.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fixed bug in PlayerInfoPanel where Longest Road and/or Largest Army would not display properly. Fixed bug in the Player class where getLongestRoadLength would always return 1. Fixed bug in GameController where development cards were not removed from the player's CardsFrame after they were played.
